TitleEnglish: Miss Maid Simply Loves to Eat
SummaryEnglish: What's a maid to do when she finds herself suddenly stuck in Japan for a year? Eat, of course! Follow maid-in-training Suzume Tachibana as she tries all sorts of Japanese food, from sweets like taiyaki and melon bread to savory snacks like takoyaki and onigiri! Be warned, thoughâ€”while Suzume sates her appetite through delicious treat after delicious treat, she might just end up whetting yours!
Aliases: Maid Just Simply Love to Eat
The Food Diary of Miss Maid
